values_1: 1) Assoc w R;2) Assoc w R - Interim
description: if the confidence level of variants identified is in the list (; separated) then default interpretation is resistant

if the confidence level of variants identified is in the list (; separated) then interpretation is Susceptible (not reportable) - these will not be included in determination of resistance classification
Where there are any variants that are not in the upstream reagion resistance is abrogated - this will override default rule

values_1: 1) Assoc w R;2) Assoc w R - Interim
description: if the confidence level of variants identified is in the list (; separated) then default interpretation is resistant

if the confidence level of variants identified is in the list (; separated) then interpretation is Susceptible (not reportable) - these will not be included in determination of resistance classification
If mmpL5 is in the gene column then the sample is susceptible - this will override default rule
if there is a single variant that equals rpoB_p.Asp435Tyr then the interpretation is low-level resistant - this will override the default rule - custom
